alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 3:31PM MST until December 14 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in the higher elevations. 1 to 3 inches in the lower valleys. * WHERE...Highway 95 Slate Creek to Riggins, and White Bird Grade. * WHEN...Until 5 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region
